author: alita85
content: <@!642887713246150666> <@!191378736254287874> I think the recurring and structured meetings are a good idea, but I also want to maintain a less structured option

author: alita85
content: Micah mentioned that focused calls might be better (EIPIP call), and I agree with that. I think a focused call would better facilitate the free and long-form discourse needed to fully discuss contentious topics in ACD.

author: alita85
content: If you're okay with exploring that, I'd like to offer a breakout room to the core devs immediately following next ACD

author: lightclient
content: <@104006934562107392> I would prefer to have a break a between ACD and a breakout session. 3 straight hours of technical discussions is a lot at one sitting, so if we could split it up into different days, that would be ideal.

author: alita85
content: that makes sense, if others feel the same then I concede my points ðŸ™‚
